mapper.select: select id, tenantid, referrer_id, referrer_cert_no, referrer_cert_type, referrer_name, referrer_email, mobile_no, referrer_card_no, status, channel_no, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, remark from crm_referrer_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into crm_referrer_info(tenantid, referrer_id, referrer_cert_no, referrer_cert_type, referrer_name, referrer_email, mobile_no, referrer_card_no, status, channel_no, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, remark) values (#{tenantid}, #{referrerId}, #{referrerCertNo}, #{referrerCertType}, #{referrerName}, #{referrerEmail}, #{mobileNo}, #{referrerCardNo}, #{status}, #{channelNo}, #{createtime}, #{lastmodifiedtime}, #{remark})

insert into crm_referrer_info(tenantid, referrer_id, referrer_cert_no, referrer_cert_type, referrer_name, referrer_email, mobile_no, referrer_card_no, status, channel_no, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, remark) values
(#{entity.tenantid}, #{entity.referrerId}, #{entity.referrerCertNo}, #{entity.referrerCertType}, #{entity.referrerName}, #{entity.referrerEmail}, #{entity.mobileNo}, #{entity.referrerCardNo}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.channelNo}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.lastmodifiedtime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into crm_referrer_info(tenantid, referrer_id, referrer_cert_no, referrer_cert_type, referrer_name, referrer_email, mobile_no, referrer_card_no, status, channel_no, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, remark) values
(#{entity.tenantid}, #{entity.referrerId}, #{entity.referrerCertNo}, #{entity.referrerCertType}, #{entity.referrerName}, #{entity.referrerEmail}, #{entity.mobileNo}, #{entity.referrerCardNo}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.channelNo}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.lastmodifiedtime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update tenantid = values(tenantid), referrer_id = values(referrer_id), referrer_cert_no = values(referrer_cert_no), referrer_cert_type = values(referrer_cert_type), referrer_name = values(referrer_name), referrer_email = values(referrer_email), mobile_no = values(mobile_no), referrer_card_no = values(referrer_card_no), status = values(status), channel_no = values(channel_no), createtime = values(createtime), lastmodifiedtime = values(lastmodifiedtime), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update crm_referrer_info
tenantid = #{tenantid},
referrer_id = #{referrerId},
referrer_cert_no = #{referrerCertNo},
referrer_cert_type = #{referrerCertType},
referrer_name = #{referrerName},
referrer_email = #{referrerEmail},
mobile_no = #{mobileNo},
referrer_card_no = #{referrerCardNo},
status = #{status},
channel_no = #{channelNo},
createtime = #{createtime},
lastmodifiedtime = #{lastmodifiedtime},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
